events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th, involving another vehicle at an intersection.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on details describing a collision between two automobiles.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the claim and will contact the customer shortly for further details.
The customer received confirmation that their claim has been acknowledged and is now in progress with the claims department.
Request sent to customer asking for police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver license to support the claim evaluation.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including the accident police report, multiple photos of the damaged car, and identification.
Claims team has commenced an investigation looking into the details of the accident and the liability between involved parties.
Investigation concluded confirming the customer’s vehicle was hit by the other driver who caused the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and associated expenses from the auto accident.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed gratitude for the prompt handling of their claim.
The claim has been officially approved for payment after all approvals and documents were verified successfully.
Payment was issued to the customer’s bank account covering all approved expenses for repairs and damages sustained in the accident.
The claim case has now been closed following final payment and acknowledgement from the customer of successful resolution.
